reviews.review_msg: If u need a good nap, his lectures are the place to be. just bring a blanket and curl up to this slow-paced and humdrum voice. He records his lectures and has them available, so i suggest you increase the play speed setting to about 1.4x then he'll speak at your pace. midterm was directly from the text and courseware, final inspired by lectures

Erickson is a good prof that keeps lectures interesting with humour and other outside influences. The last essay question on his final is alway from left field.  And his late policy is ROCK solid... my computer crashed and I lost my paper hours before it was due... you can still pass the course if this happens just rock the final.
Easy corse, Midterm easy and final preaty easy but you do have to study. He marks the essays easy to! Overall recomended class

great professor... very engaging and analytical.  Not for those who like to be spoonfed with cute overheads and powerpoint presentations, but more thematic and critical in his approach.  very helpful in office hours and cute too!  A bit challenging for 1st year, but suck it up.
